packages.description:
The package or packages to update.

该包或要更新的包。

force.description:
When false (the default), reports an error if installed packages are incompatible with the update.

如果为 false（默认值），则如果要安装的包与此更新不兼容，就报告错误。

next.description:
Update to the latest version, including beta and RCs.

更新到最新版本，包括 beta 和 RC。

migrateOnly.description:
Perform a migration, but do not update the installed version.

执行迁移，但不要更新已安装的版本。

from.description:
When using `--migrateOnly` for a single package, the version of that package from which to migrate.

当对单个包应用 `--migrateOnly` 时，要迁移的包的原始版本。

to.description:
When using `--migrateOnly` for a single package, the version of that package to which to migrate.

当对单个包应用 `--migrateOnly` 时，要迁移的包的目标版本。

registry.description:
The npm registry to use.

要使用的 NPM registry。

verbose.description:
Display additional details during the update process.

在升级过程中显示更多详情。

packageManager.description:
The preferred package manager configuration files to use for registry settings.

用于访问 Registry 设置的首选包管理器配置文件。
